Package it.polimi.is23am10.server.model.factory

Class GameFactory

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.is23am10.server.model.factory.GameFactory
public final class GameFactory extends Object
The GameFactory class definition. This creates a new Game object.

  • Method Details

    • getNewGame

      public static Game getNewGame(String startingPlayerName, Integer maxPlayerNum) throws NullMaxPlayerException, InvalidMaxPlayerException, NullPlayerNameException, NullPlayerIdException, NullPlayerBookshelfException, NullPlayerScoreException, NullPlayerPrivateCardException, NullPlayerScoreBlocksException, DuplicatePlayerNameException, AlreadyInitiatedPatternException, NullPlayerNamesException, InvalidNumOfPlayersException, NullNumOfPlayersException, NullAssignedPatternException, FullGameException, NotValidScoreBlockValueException, PlayerNotFoundException
      Create a new Game instance.
      Parameters:
      startingPlayerName - The starting player name, who has requested the game.
      maxPlayerNum - The desired maximum player number, specified by the first player.
      Throws:
      NullMaxPlayerException - If no value for maximum number of players in the game is provided.
      InvalidMaxPlayerException - If value for maximum number of players in the game is not valid.
      NullPlayerNameException - If player name is null.
      NullPlayerIdException - If player id is null.
      NullPlayerBookshelfException - If bookshelf is null.
      NullPlayerScoreException - If player's score object is null.
      NullPlayerPrivateCardException - If player's private card object is null.
      NullPlayerScoreBlocksException - If player's scoreblocks list is null.
      DuplicatePlayerNameException - If player with that name already exists.
      AlreadyInitiatedPatternException - If assigning a pattern to a card that already has one.
      NullPlayerNamesException - If, while adding multiple players, the list of player names is null.
      InvalidNumOfPlayersException - If, while adding multiple players, there is an invalid number of them.
      NullNumOfPlayersException - If the number of players provided when filling the board is null.
      NullAssignedPatternException - If the pattern assigned to a card is null.
      NotValidScoreBlockValueException - If the value assigned to a scoreblock is not valid.
      PlayerNotFoundException - If the player with the name provided is not found.
      FullGameException
